description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter application, which includes an app bar with search and navigation buttons, a hero banner, genres grid, and a new arrivals carousel. It manages navigation and UI components related to the home page.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that represents the main home screen, including app bar, banners, genre selection, and new arrivals list.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the UI state, navigation actions, and event handlers for HomeScreen.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the search controller when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _openListing
methods.description: Navigates to the listing page, optionally with a category slug.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product details page for a specific book.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, including app bar, banner, genre grid, and carousel.

methods.name: _heroBanner
methods.description: Returns a widget displaying the hero banner.

methods.name: _genresGrid
methods.description: Returns a widget displaying genre cards as a grid.

methods.name: _circleIcon
methods.description: Returns a tappable circular icon widget.

methods.name: _sectionTitle
methods.description: Returns a styled section title widget.
